About Al Khizanah

A collective of developers building practical tools, shared infrastructure, and open documentation for reliable software delivery.

Our Mission

We believe in building software that matters. Our focus is on creating tools and solutions that solve real problems and make developers' lives easier.

What We Value

Purpose-Driven

Every project addresses real-world challenges with practical solutions

Open Source

Transparent development with community collaboration at the core

Quality First

Well-documented, tested, and maintainable code as standard

Collaborative

Building together through shared knowledge and mutual respect

Contribution Guidelines

We welcome contributions from the community. Here's how to get involved:

1

Start a Discussion

Open an issue before implementing large changes to align on approach

2

Keep It Focused

Submit focused pull requests with clear documentation updates

3

Follow Standards

Use consistent coding styles and write meaningful commit messages

4

Stay Engaged

Respond to feedback promptly and keep all communication respectful

Get in Touch

Interested in collaborating or have questions about our projects?
